entry.title: Chengdu Shihao English Corner, June 24, 2025
entry.summary:
How it started

Yesterday, I listened to a talk by a PhD who has learned five foreign languages. He said:

  • Be brave to speak and donâ€™t be afraid of making mistakes;
  • Do some preparation before coming to the English corner.

Therefore, I am writing this blog to record the preparations I am making for todayâ€™s English corner.

Introduce myself
